entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story, referred to by Hagrid as 'Potter'. He is accompanied by Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who accompanies him to visit Hagrid.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another friend of Harry's who joins them in visiting Hagrid.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is visited by Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is Hagrid's dog who lays his head on Harry's knee.

relationships.description: Harry and his friends visit Hagrid at his home.
Ron is also part of the group that visits Hagrid.
Hermione joins Harry and Ron in visiting Hagrid.
Fang lays his head on Harry's knee, indicating a friendly interaction between them.
